name: The Magnificent Four
description:
The game has 8 levels. The levels become harder, but you can  quickly restart the level if you die.

The character can take 2 hits before he dies.

Movement:

W, Up arrow, space- jump. You can do a double jump.

A, Left arrow - move left

D, Right arrow- more right

E- shoot

Q- pull lever

Escape, P - pause game

Gamepad controls are added but not tested.
